wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Young, JP (1858–17 Feb 1943) was a teacher, magistrate, and an MP.

response: Andrew Young (born 1932) is an American civil rights activist, former congressman, and former U.S. ambassador to the United Nations.
Andrew Young may also refer to:
* Andrew Young (mathematician) (Andrew White Young) (1891–1968), Scottish scientist and lawyer
* Andrew Young (poet) (Andrew John Young) (1885–1971), Scottish poet and writer on botanical subjects
* Andrew Young (political operative) (Andrew Aldridge Young) (born 1966), staffer with John Edwards
* Andrew Young (schoolmaster and poet) (1807–1889), Scottish author of "There is a Happy Land"
* Andrew Young (skier) (born 1992), Scottish Olympic cross-country skier
* Andrew Young (baseball) (Andrew Jacob Young) (born 1994), American baseball player
